responses: Hello! Welcome to CuraCompanion. How can I assist you with your health queries today?
Thank you for visiting CuraCompanion. Stay healthy!
CuraCompanion is a health analytics platform that provides risk predictions for diabetes, heart disease, and neurological conditions, along with a health-focused chatbot for your queries.
You can get risk predictions for diabetes, heart disease, and neurological conditions. You can also chat with me for health-related information and guidance.

patterns: How do I use this website?
responses: Simply enter your health details in the relevant section and submit. The system will analyze your data and provide a risk prediction. You can also ask me health-related questions anytime.
Your data is processed securely and is not shared with third parties. We value your privacy and confidentiality.
For support, please use the contact form on our website or email us at support@curacompanion.com.
I'm here to help with questions about CuraCompanion and its health services. Please ask something related to this website.
